content: We also reported adjusted EBITDA of $55 million and nearly doubled free cash flow from last year, a strong bottom line result reflecting both revenue growth and continued financial discipline. Bumble apps continue to power our overall growth, with revenue up 33% year-over-year to $170 million, primarily driven by a 31% increase in paying users. Now turning to our other dating apps, Badoo and other revenue, including Fruitz totaled $51 million in Q2 down 14% year-over-year. Paying users for Bumble App totaled $1.9 million, up 31% year-over-year. We expect Bumble App revenue to be between $184 million and $187 million, representing a growth rate of 29% to 31% year-over-year supported by continued growth in net paying user additions.
